Academic Commons Staff

Michael Spalti is our Academic Commons Coordinator. Contact Michael with general questions about the Academic Commons or about creating a new collection.

Contact Michael at mspalti@willamette.edu or 503-370-6715

Sara Amato is our Digital Asset Management Librarian. Sara oversees most aspects of digitization and collection management.

Contact Sara at samato@willamette.edu or 503-370-6719

Bill Kelm is our Systems Librarian. Bill provides direct help to those maintaining collections.

Contact Bill at bkelm@willamette.edu or 503-375-5332
